track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description: Compete in our World CodeSprint inviting coders everywhere to #codethefuture. World CodeSprint is a 24 hour online code competition open to all developers worldwide. Solve 8 algorithmic CodeChallenges advancing you to develop in-demand skills needed to build the future. Win prizes and get discovered by cool companies.
primary_contest.name: World CodeSprint

model.python3_template:
#!/bin/python3

import sys


n,m = input().strip().split(' ')
n,m = [int(n),int(m)]
c = [int(c_temp) for c_temp in input().strip().split(' ')]
model.name: Flatland Space Stations
model.python_template:
#!/bin/python

import sys


n,m = raw_input().strip().split(' ')
n,m = [int(n),int(m)]
c = map(int,raw_input().strip().split(' '))
model.ruby_template:
#!/bin/ruby

n,m = gets.strip.split(' ')
n = n.to_i
m = m.to_i
c = gets.strip
c = c.split(' ').map(&:to_i)
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    n_temp <- getLine
    let n_t = words n_temp
    let n = read $ n_t!!0 :: Int
    let m = read $ n_t!!1 :: Int
    c_temp <- getLine
    let c = map read $ words c_temp :: [Int]

getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Find the maximum distance an astronaut needs to travel to reach the nearest space station.
model.clojure_template:
(use '[clojure.string :only (split triml)])

(
        let [
          n_temp (read-line) 
          n_t (split n_temp #"\s+") 
          n (Integer/parseInt (n_t 0)) 
          m (Integer/parseInt (n_t 1)) 
        ]

      (
        let [
          c_temp (read-line) 
          c_t (split c_temp #"\s+") 
          c (map #(Integer/parseInt %) c_t) 
        ]
      )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [N,M]} = io:fread("", "~d~d"),
    C = read_array(M,"~d"),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
n,m = io.read("*number", "*number", "*l")
c = {}
c_temp = io.read()
c_i = 1;
for token in string.gmatch(c_temp, "[^%s]+") do
	c[c_i] = token
	c_i = c_i + 1
end
